info.headline: Software Developer #blockchain #AI
info.summary: Particularly fascinated by the AI since I read  "Gödel, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid", and by blockchain's applications and consequences on our society.  Also very curious about any kind of software development that requires reasoning and imagination in finding creative solutions.
